titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Attorney General Janet Reno should apply to the Special Division of the United States Court of Appeals for the appointment of an independent counsel to investigate a number of matters relating to the campaign finance investigation currently being conducted by the Department of Justice.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/31/1998--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the Attorney General should seek application for an independent counsel for the campaign finance investigation and related matters; and (2) the President should direct her to do so.
